DoNotThrowExceptionInFinally.description:
Description

Throwing exceptions within a ‘finally’ block is confusing since they may mask other exceptions
or code defects.
Note: This is a PMD implementation of the Lint4j rule "A throw in a finally block"

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
DoNotThrowExceptionInFinally.option: This rule has no specific options.
